task.title: Create lib/session.sh with animal wordlist
task.description:
## Context
Session identity allows concurrent curb instances to be distinguished. The animal wordlist provides friendly, memorable names.

## Implementation Hints

**Recommended Model:** haiku
**Estimated Duration:** 25m
**Approach:** Create a Bash array with ~100 animal names. Keep it simple - no external dependencies.

## Implementation Steps
1. Create lib/session.sh with standard header
2. Define ANIMAL_NAMES array with ~100 animals (fox, owl, bear, wolf, etc.)
3. Add session_random_name() function that picks randomly from array
4. Source xdg.sh for any path helpers needed

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] lib/session.sh exists with proper header
- [ ] ANIMAL_NAMES array contains ~100 unique animals
- [ ] session_random_name returns a valid animal name
- [ ] No external dependencies beyond bash builtins

## Files Likely Involved
- lib/session.sh (new)

## Notes
Use $RANDOM % array_length for selection. Animals should be lowercase, single words.
